 Getting your news from a clip off of YouTube huh? emoticon_xgood

Getting your news from a clip off of YouTube huh? emoticon_xgood

 
 Absolutely! It requires a lot of sifting but, there is a lot more information available...compared to the main stream media.
 
 Example: I watched 9, 10 min segments of an Alex Jones radio program of an interview with Chaplain Lindsay Williams. 
 Williams is a Christian Fundamentalist and believes the Elite were warned by their occult sources, just weeks before the explosion happened, to sell their BP stock. 
 'Goldman Sachs sold 44% of its BP Stock, 3 weeks before the Oil Rig disaster.' 
 Coincidence? Maybe, maybe not.
 I sifted out the occult nonsense and investigated the stock selling...I still don't know if this is true or not.
 
 There are just a lot more pieces of the puzzle to be found by rooting around the unusual sources and when put together, give a clearer picture of what's going on.
